description.displayText: Martyna is very gentle with children. She's caring, loves to give her all. She's hard-working, you can depend on her with any situation. Extra hours or extra babysitting, she's always ready to do it.  She takes her responsibilities very serious. She's also creative, comes up with many fun games and art work. She loves children and you can tell she enjoys doing it. I'll highly recommend Martyna !! She's amazing !!!
